name: Tumblr
description:
Script that allows you to post regular type posts to Tumblr.

Begin a new post by opening a buffer and using the :TumblrNew command, when finished use the :TumblrPost command.
install_details:
How: Add 'let tumblr_email="INSERT EMAIL"' and 'let tumblr_password="INSERT PASSWORD"' to your .vimrc, obviously putting in the correct email and password for your account.

Move the file to your ~/.vim/plugin folder.

versions.release_notes: Peter Hoffman wanted to be able to post a range and sent some code so now post a range by selected at least least 2 lines where the first line is the title and the rest is the body.
